text: Lawrence Joseph Ellison (born August 17, 1944) is an American businessman, entrepreneur, and philanthropist. He is a co-founder of Oracle Corporation. Between 1977 and 2014, he was chief executive officer of Oracle. Today, he is executive chairman and chief technology officer. As of March 2019, he was listed by Forbes magazine as the fourth-richest person in the United States and as the seventh-richest in the world, with a fortune of $63.5 billion, up from $54.5 billion in 2018. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American billionaires Category:American Jews Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Jewish billionaires Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish philanthropists
title: Larry Ellison
